tool_description: Checks technician availability and skill matching for scheduled maintenance tasks.
error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Invalid estimated hours: Must be between 0.5 and 8.0 hours.
No matching technicians: No technicians found with the required skill set.
Invalid skill specification: Provide at least one required skill from the approved skills list.
usage: Provide start_date, end_date, and required_skills array. Optionally specify estimated_hours to find available technicians with matching qualifications.

available_technicians.description: List of available technician IDs with required skills

availability_slots.description: Available time slots in ISO 8601 format

skill_match_score.description: Skill matching scores for each available technician (0-100)
